title: Verify: Selecting the Fox Sports Go tile successfully opens the app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND the "Fox Sports Go" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Fox Sports Go from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the Fox Sports Go app will open successfully

title: Verify:  Initial UI upon startup
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND the "Fox Sports Go" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Fox Sports Go from the device Apps menu
AND the application opens for the first time
custom_expected:
THEN the following can be observed about the UI:

At left on a blue background:  
A search tool icon (top left)
"Live TV" option (highlighted by default)
"Settings" option

At right on a white background:
Fox Sports Go logo (top right)
Live Now video assets
Featured video assets

title: Verify: Main Menu Behavior - Slide
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates right into the list of program tiles
custom_expected:
THEN the menu minimizes by sliding left. 
AND when user scrolls back to the left 
THEN the menu slides back out to the right

title: Verify: Main Menu items appear properly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the main menu options
custom_expected:
THEN the menu selection items appear as follows:

SEARCH (magnifying glass icon)
LIVE TV
SETTINGS

title: Unauthenticated account is allowed to browse content items
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates through the program thumbnails within the app
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to navigate around the entire program lineup
AND the user will observe that all content images contain a "Key" icon at bottom left

title: Activation instructions when live content is selected for playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through programs
AND the user selects any Live Now content
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be directed to a screen with sign in directions
AND website details are displayed
AND a code is provided

NOTE:  The current (correct) URL displayed should be "https://www.foxsportsgo.com/AndroidTV"

title: Asset "Key" icon removed from all program thumbnails
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has authenticated their TV provider account details
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates through the program thumbnails within the app
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to navigate around the entire program lineup
AND the "Key" icon previously at the bottom left of the program's image does not display

title: Selecting a current 'Live Now' asset launches the video
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has authenticated their TV provider account details
custom_steps: WHEN the user activates a current 'Live Now' asset
custom_expected: THEN the video begins playback

title: Authorization - Activation Screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through programs
AND the user selects any Live Now content
AND the user is prompted to sign in
AND the user goes to the URL provided by the app on a desktop or mobile device
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought to the AndroidTV activation screen

title: Authorization - Activation Code
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
AND has attempted to view a live program
AND has the activation instructions displayed on the app
AND has URL "https://www.foxsportsgo.com/AndroidTV" up on desktop or mobile device
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the provided code from the app into the activation code entry field
AND submits the code
custom_expected: THEN the user will be on the TV provider selection screen

custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed

custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the provider sign in screen
custom_expected: THEN there is a link below the main provider list displaying "More TV Providers"

title: Desktop - More TV Providers - Auto-Populate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
AND the user has signed in with their activation code on their desktop or mobile device
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the "More TV Providers" link
AND after the page updates to the full TV Providers page
AND the user types a letter into the Search field
custom_expected:
THEN the list of providers begins to filter based on the letter entered
AND entering more than one letter continues to condense the list

title: Desktop - More TV Providers  "No Matches Found"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
AND the user has signed in with their activation code on their desktop or mobile device
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the "More TV Providers" link
AND after the page updates to the full TV Providers page
AND the user types an invalid 'provider' into the Search field
custom_expected: THEN the list of providers will disappear and text showing "No matches found" will appear

title: Provider Authentication - Initialization
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
AND the user has signed in with their activation code on their desktop or mobile device
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is prompted to sign in with their TV provider
THEN chooses a TV provider
custom_expected:
THEN the page will navigate to the TV provider's sign in screen
AND the user is prompted to sign directly into the provider's authentication screen

title: Provider Authentication - Invalid Credentials
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
AND the user has signed in with their activation code on their desktop or mobile device
AND the user has chosen a TV provider from the list
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters invalid credentials
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive an error message 
AND is prompted to re-enter credentials again

title: Provider Authentication - Valid Credentials
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
AND the user has signed in with their activation code on their desktop or mobile device
AND the user has chosen a TV provider from the list
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters valid credentials
custom_expected:
THEN the TV provider's sign in page will authenticate
AND the user is brought back to the FSGo activation page with a 'Success' message

title: Verify Titles Configurations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the programming schedule UI
custom_expected:
Titles
 
a) For professional and college team events, displays team matchup only
    - International Soccer: Manchester City vs. Chelsea
    - All other Team Sports: Jets at Patriots
 
b) For other programs, display program title concatenated with "episode" information as provided by TMS (as is done currently for all programs in FOX Sports GO)
 
Titles for large chips have a maximum length of 2 lines. If the title extends beyond 2 lines, an ellipsis will appear at the end of the second line.
 
Titles for small chips have a maximum of 3 lines.  If the title extends beyond 3 lines, an ellipsis will appear at the end of the third line.

title: Verify channel tags are displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the programming schedule UI
custom_expected:
Then each program displays a channel tag at the top left of the thumbnail image.

Current list of channel tags are as follows:
FS1
FS2
Deportes
Fox Soccer Plus
YES Network
WNYW
KTVU
Big East
(As time goes on, the list may fluctuate)

title: Verify LIVE program style
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
custom_steps:
WHEN the user observes the programming schedule UI
AND checks out the 'Live Now' programs
custom_expected: THEN it is observed that the asset displays a 'LIVE' icon and scheduled time, in orange, under the show's image thumbnail

title: Verify upcoming program style
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
custom_steps:
WHEN the user observes the programming schedule UI
AND checks out the Upcoming programs
custom_expected: THEN it is observed that the scheduled time is in gray font

title: Verify Featured programming display limits
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
custom_steps:
WHEN the user observes the programming schedule UI
AND checks out the Featured programs
custom_expected: THEN a maximum limit of six programs are displayed

title: Verify Feature show tiles are correct size
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
custom_steps:
WHEN the user observes the programming schedule UI
AND checks out the Featured programs
custom_expected: THEN the tile should appear to be double the width of the Upcoming program image thumbnails

title: Verify: Search UI when search icon activated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND we are displaying the main menu options
custom_steps: WHEN we select and activate the search icon (magnifying glass)
custom_expected:
THEN the search screen UI will appear and display the following:
TOP: Search Field (in focus by default)
MIDDLE: White space (where the results will display)
BOTTOM: Device keyboard

title: Verify: Recent searched terms appear
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND we select and activate the search icon (magnifying glass)
AND we have made searches previously
custom_steps: WHEN the user accesses the search engine
custom_expected:
THEN by default, recent searches will appear in a horizontal list above the keyboard
AND in navigating up into the list, all the previous search terms are accessible

title: Verify: Recent search result limitations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND we select and activate the search icon (magnifying glass)
AND we have made several searches previously
custom_steps:
WHEN the user accesses the search engine
AND observes previous search terms in the search
AND navigates up into the list of search terms
AND counts the quantity of search terms accessible
custom_expected: THEN the list is limited to only 10 results

title: Verify: Keyword search auto-populates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND we select and activate the search icon (magnifying glass)
custom_steps: WHEN the user types any random letter
custom_expected:
THEN a list of auto-populated suggestions will appear above the keyboard horizontally
AND adding characters to the search string will update the list of suggestions

title: Verify: Search results with live content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND has selected and activated the search icon (magnifying glass)
AND we have notated the name of a current live program
custom_steps: WHEN the user searches for a keyword that matches the title of a live program
custom_expected:
THEN the live program appears first at the very top displayed as a larger thumbnail
AND if there are more search results beyond the live program
THEN all Upcoming programs will appear below the live asset
AND the thumbnails are nearly half the size of the live thumbnail

title: Verify: Search results without live content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND has selected and activated the search icon (magnifying glass)
AND we have notated the names of the current live programs
custom_steps: WHEN the user searches for a keyword/show that DOES NOT MATCH a current live program
custom_expected: THEN only Upcoming programs will appear

title: Verify: Player launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND the user is signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to play any current 'Live Now' program
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the program will play without any issues

title: Verify: Upcoming program playback messaging
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to activate an upcoming program's tile
custom_expected:
THEN an overlay appears on screen with a message stating:

[Title] will start at [Time] on [Day] date and time that program will begin.

title: Verify: Attempted playback of content while signed out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND the user is not signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to play any current 'Live Now' program
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be directed to a screen with sign in directions
AND upon going through the process of signing in
THEN after a few seconds, the sign in screen will disappear
AND the program selected will begin to play

title: Verify: "Live Now" linear programming behavior
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND the USER is signed in with a valid Cable Authentication account
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch ANY LIVE TV video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will continue playing the next show in the channel's lineup

title: Ensure MultiView icon appears
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Begin playing any Feed.
2. Access Video Player UI
custom_expected: Ensure MultiView icon appears on the Video Player UI

title: Ensure MultiView icon on the Video Player UI can be selected
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Begin playing any Feed.

2. Access Video Player UI

3. Select Multi-View icon
custom_expected: Ensure Multi-View icon on the Video Player UI can be selected, and once selected the icon turns orange

title: Ensure the MultiView picker icons appear below the video player UI
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Begin playing any Feed.

2. Access Video Player UI

3. Select Multi-View icon
custom_expected: The MultiView picker icons should appear below the video player UI and the ‘Full’ View icon is currently the default selection, as indicated by its orange color

title: Ensure all of the MultiView picker icons can be navigated to and selected
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Begin playing any Feed.
2. Access Video Player UI
3. Select Multi-View icon
4. Press down to access the Mutli-View Screen Layout icons
custom_expected:
All of the MultiView picker icons can be navigated to and selected, including Full, and the icons will turn orange to indicate they’ve been selected

AND

Ensure all text is clear, readable, and free from errors

title: Ensure that Full can be selected
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Begin playing any Feed.
2. Access Video Player UI
3. Select Multi-View icon
4. Press down to access the Multi-View Screen Layout icons
5. Select a view other than Full
6. Navigate back to Full and select it
custom_expected: Full Screen can be selected and the UI will change from the 'other' view back to Full screen view

title: Ensure that with Full selected, the video player UI still functions as expected
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Play any Feed in Full Screen view.
2. Access Video Player UI
3. Navigate to and select different elements of the video player UI
custom_expected:
With Full selected, the video player UI still functions as expected 
Pause/Play icon(s)
RWD
FFWD
CC (enable/disable)

title: Verify MVPD logo is present with onscreen video controls
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Play any Feed in Full Screen view.
2. Access Video Player UI
custom_expected: While the video controls are onscreen, the MVPD logo will be present in the upper right hand corner.

title: Ensure that the Video Player UI, after being enabled, disappears after ~5 seconds
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Play any Feed in Full Screen view.
2. Access Video Player UI
3. Cease pressing buttons on the remote/controller
custom_expected: The Video Player UI, after being enabled, disappears after around 5 seconds of no input from the remote/controller.

title: Ensure that with Full selected, all current Live feeds will display below
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Play any Feed in Full Screen view.
2. Access Feed picker
custom_expected:
All current Live feeds will display below the View Screen picker icons (Full, PIP, etc.) and that the feeds can be scrolled through from left to right and back again with no issues

AND

Ensure that the displayed currently Live feeds are indeed the correct ones

title: Ensure that the currently selected feed will be indicated
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. With any Feed playing in Full Screen view.
2. Access Feed picker
custom_expected: The currently selected feed will be indicated with the Full Screen icon turning orange.

title: Ensure that another feed can be selected and will begin playing
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. With any Feed playing in Full Screen view.
2. Access Feed picker
3. Switch to a new Feed
custom_expected: Another feed can be selected and will begin playing without issue

title: Ensure that any Live feed with a start time >2 hours ago can be selected
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. With any Feed playing in Full Screen view.
2. Access Feed picker
3. Switch to a new Feed with a start time >2 hours ago
custom_expected: Ensure that if any Live feed is displayed with a start time greater than 2 hours ago, that it can be selected and played without issue

title: Ensure that audio for the feed plays without issue and syncs acceptably
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. With any Feed playing in Full Screen view.
2. Listen to the audio and observe the video for the selected feed.
custom_expected: Ensure that audio for the currently selected feed plays without issue and syncs acceptably with the displayed video

title: Ensure when feeds switch that audio plays without issue and sync acceptably
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. With any Feed playing in Full Screen view.
2. Listen to the audio and observe the video for the selected feed.
3. In the LIVE TV Feed picker switch to a new feed.
custom_expected: When switching feeds the audio will switch accordingly and play without issue and sync acceptably with the displayed video

title: Select PiP and ensure UI updates accordingly
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Begin playing any Feed.
2. Access Video Player UI
3. Select Multi-View icon
4. Press down to access the Mutli-View Screen Layout icons
5. Select PIP
custom_expected: The screen will display the Primary screen with PiP appearing in the upper right

title: Ensure that video player UI’s functions are greyed out
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. With PIP playing any Feed.
2. Access Video Player UI
custom_expected:
The video player control functions cannot be activated (Pause, Play, FFWD, RWD and CC enable/disable)
The only icons able to be activated once Multi-View is chosen will be the view selector below the Video UI bar

title: Ensure that the Video Player UI disappears after ~5 seconds
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Play any Feed in PIP Screen view.
2. Access Video Player UI
3. Cease pressing buttons on the remote/controller
custom_expected: The Video Player UI, after being enabled, disappears after around 5 seconds of no input from the remote/controller

title: Ensure that either selection, Primary or PiP screen will turn orange
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Play any Feed in PIP Screen view.
2. Access the Screen/Audio Selector section
3. Choose a different screen option and observe app behavior
4. Switch back to the initial screen option and observe app behavior
custom_expected: Either selection, Primary or PiP screen, will have its icon turn orange when it is the currently selected option.

title: Ensure all text for the MultiView Selector area is free from errors
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Access the Multi-view Screen Selector section
2. Observe text of all options
custom_expected: Ensure all text for the area is clear, readable, and free from errors

title: Ensure that all current Live feeds will display below with no issues
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Play any Feed in PIP Screen view.
2. Access the LIVE TV Feed Selector section
3. Scroll through the feeds from left to right and back again
custom_expected:
All current Live feeds will display below the Multi-view Selector and that the feeds can be scrolled through from left to right and back again with no issues

AND

That the displayed currently Live feeds are indeed the correct ones

title: Ensure that the current Live feed defaulted to ‘Primary’ Screen
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Choose PIP Screen view.
2. Observe the LIVE TV Feed Selector section
custom_expected:
The current Live feed below the Multi-view Selector for ‘Primary’ is the feed that was playing when Multi-View was first selected

AND

The currently selected feed will be indicated with its icon turning orange.

title: Ensure that while no PiP Screen feed selected, that Live feeds have no issues
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Choose PIP Screen view.
2. In Multi-view Selector section, select PiP screen (such that the grey rectangle appears in the upper right of the screen)
3. Access the LIVE TV feed selector section
4. Scroll to the right and back left again
custom_expected: While PiP Screen is selected (with no PiP screen *feed* selected), that the Live feeds can be scrolled through from left to right and back again with no issues.

title: Ensure that a different feed can be selected as the Primary feed
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. With any Feed playing in PIP Screen's Primary screen.
2. Access Feed picker
3. Select the current primary video asset
3. Select a new Feed
custom_expected: Ensure that the feed can be replaced and will begin playing as the Primary feed

title: Ensure that any Live feed with a start time >2 hours ago can be selected
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. With any Feed playing in PIP Screen's Primary screen.
2. Access Feed picker
3. Switch to a new Feed with a start time >2 hours ago
custom_expected: Ensure that if any Live feed is displayed with a start time greater than 2 hours ago, that it can be selected and played without issue as the Primary screen feed

title: Ensure when PiP Screen is selected (with no feed selected) UI updates
custom_preconds: Be logged in with an MPVD account, have MultiView enabled
custom_steps:
1. Select PIP MultiView icon
2. In Multi-view Selector move selection from Primary to PiP Screen.
3. Choose PiP Screen.
custom_expected:
A grey rectangle appears in the upper right corner of the screen overlaying the Primary screen’s feed and while the video UI is onscreen that the MVPD logo will be present in the upper right hand corner

AND

Live feeds can be scrolled through from left to right and back again with no issues 

AND

No title is displayed on the video player UI until a feed has been chosen (will choose one in the next case)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/3634)

title: Ensure that with PiP Screen selected that a LIVE TV feed can be selected and UI updates
custom_preconds: Be logged in with an MPVD account, have MultiView enabled
custom_steps:
1. Select PIP MultiView icon
2. In MultiView Selector, move selection from Primary to PiP Screen.
3. Choose PiP Screen
4. Move down to Feeds and choose any available Feed.
custom_expected:
While PiP Screen is selected a feed can be selected and will begin playing as the PiP Screen feed (replacing the grey rectangle) in the upper right corner of the screen

AND

Once selected the icon will turn orange on the newly selected feed.

title: Ensure that switching between Primary and PiP Screen will switch the Audio
custom_preconds:
Be logged in with an MPVD account, 
Have a video playing
AND have audio turned up to an audible level
custom_steps:
1. Select PIP MultiView icon
2. Navigate below the MultiView selector and choose another video
3. Listen to audio (a)
4. On screen, move focus to PiP window.
5. Listen to audio (b)
6. On screen, move focus from PiP Screen to Primary
7. Listen to audio (a)
custom_expected:
Ensure that switching between Primary and PiP Screen (and back again) will switch the currently playing Audio
(a) audio should be the primary
(b) audio should be the PiP

title: Ensure that audio for currently selected feed for Primary plays without issue
custom_preconds:
Be logged in with an MPVD account, have Multi-View enabled

AND

Have audio turned up to an audible level
custom_steps:
1. Select PIP MultiView icon
2. On Primary Screen, listen to audio
custom_expected: Ensure that audio for the currently selected feed for Primary plays without issue and syncs acceptably with the displayed video

title: Ensure that audio for currently selected feed for PiP plays without issue
custom_preconds:
Be logged in with an MPVD account, have Multi-View enabled

AND

Have audio turned up to an audible level
custom_steps:
1. Select PIP MultiView icon
2. On PiP Screen, listen to audio
custom_expected: Ensure that audio for the currently selected feed for PiP Screen plays without issue and syncs acceptably with the displayed video

title: Ensure when switching feeds for PiP that audio will switch and play without issue
custom_preconds:
Be logged in with an MPVD account, have Multi-View enabled

AND

Have audio turned up to an audible level
custom_steps:
1. Select PIP MultiView icon
2. On PiP Screen, listen to audio
3. In LIVE TV choose another feed.
4. Listen to audio
custom_expected: Ensure when switching feeds for PiP Screen that the audio will switch accordingly and play without issue and sync acceptably with the displayed video

title: Select Dual View and ensure UI updates accordingly
custom_preconds: Be logged into the app with an MVPD account.
custom_steps:
1. Begin playing any Feed.
2. Access Video Player UI
3. Select Multi-View icon
4. Press down to access the Mutli-View Screen Layout icons
5. Select Dual View
custom_expected: The screen will have a left and right screen with the primary screen now playing on the left.

title: Verify Closed Caption is visible and accessible in the video control display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND the USER is signed in with a valid Cable Authentication account
custom_steps: WHEN the user displays the video controls
custom_expected: THEN the user can see and access the CC controls here

title: Verify Closed Caption Button is present and accessible within Video Player UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND the USER is signed in with a valid Cable Authentication account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user initializes playback for any viewable content items (LIVE)
THEN toggles the Video Player UI
custom_expected:
THEN User can toggle on/off the CC in the video player. 
Default or user set settings in CC Controls will be applied.

title: Verify Closed Captions are appearing when User has Toggled setting to "ON"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND the USER is signed in with a valid Cable Authentication account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user initializes playback for any Content items (LIVE)
THEN toggles the Video Player UI to "ON"
custom_expected: THEN the user will view Closed Captions during the the duration of the video's playback

title: Verify Closed Captions do not appear when User has Toggled setting to "OFF"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
AND the USER is signed in with a valid Cable Authentication account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user initializes playback for any Content items (LIVE)
THEN toggles the Video Player UI from "ON" (when applicable) to "OFF"
custom_expected: THEN the user will no longer have Closed Captions text appearing on-screen during the the duration of the video's playback

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is playing
AND the device is connected to a wifi network able to be manipulated
custom_steps: WHEN we fluctuate the network between varying bandwidths (minimum 3 mbs to at least 15 mbs)
custom_expected:
THEN the quality of the video will fluctuate respectively
NOTE: you may experience some stuttering/buffering issues at the minimum downlink (this is normal)

title: Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is playing
AND the device is connected to a wifi network able to be manipulated
AND the network is conditioned with a downlink of min 3 mbs
custom_steps:
Launch any current live video
Observe the video quality
Condition the network to a downlink value of 15 mbs.
Observe the video quality
custom_expected:
Network quality should visually improve within an acceptable amount of time
NOTE:  you may experience some stuttering/buffering issues at the minimum downlink (this is normal)

title: Network: Verify when throttling connection strength that bitrate playback adjusts without issue in both directions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is playing
AND the device is connected to a wifi network able to be manipulated
AND the network is conditioned with a downlink of at least 15 mbs
custom_steps:
Launch any current live video
Observe the video quality
Condition the network to a downlink value of 3 mbs
Observe the video quality
Condition the network to a downlink value of at least 15 mbs
Observe video quality
custom_expected:
THEN the quality of the video will fluctuate respectively
NOTE: you may experience some stuttering/buffering issues at the 3 mbs downlink (this is normal)

title: Network: LIVE Video Playback - Network Connection Lost
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is playing
AND the device is connected to a wifi network able to be manipulated
AND the device has no other known wifi hotspots it can connect to
(Note:  You may need to 'Forget' networks from the main device's Settings)
custom_steps: WHEN we turn off the wifi network
custom_expected:
THEN stuttering and/or freezing of the video may occur
AND a network failure message appears on screen

title: Verify: All available Settings options are visible and accessible in the main menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND the "Fox Sports Go" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps:
1. Launch the FSGo app tile
2. Navigate to the Settings menu
3. Observe the options available
custom_expected:
"Sign In/Out" tile
"About" tile

title: Sign-In - App Settings Menu flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the Settings menu
AND initiates the Sign In tile
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be directed to a screen with sign in directions
AND website details are displayed
AND a code is provided

NOTE: The current (correct) URL displayed should be "https://www.foxsportsgo.com/AndroidTV"

title: Sign-In - Provider Authentication
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
AND the user has signed in with their activation code on their desktop or mobile device
AND has gone through the rest of the activation process
custom_steps: WHEN the user has gone through the rest of the Sign In process
custom_expected:
THEN upon successful login, the Sign In message on screen goes away
AND the Sign In tile is now showing as a "Sign Out" tile with the TV provider's logo displayed

title: Sign-Out - App Settings Menu flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND the user has authenticated their Cable Provider account details
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the Settings menu
AND initiates the Sign Out tile
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Sign Out confirmation screen displaying the following:

"Are you sure you want to sign out?"

Cancel button
Sign Out button

title: Sign-Out Confirmation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND the user has authenticated their Cable Provider account details
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the Settings menu
AND initiates the Sign Out tile
THEN chooses the option to "Sign Out"
custom_expected:
THEN the user will return the Fox Sports Go application in the Setting menu signed out
AND no Content tiles will be available for playback
AND all items will contain the "Key" icon within their tile graphic

title: Sign-Out Confirmation - "Cancel"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND the user has authenticated their Cable Provider account details
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the Settings menu
AND initiates the Sign Out tile
THEN chooses the option to "Cancel"
custom_expected:
THEN the user will remain within the Fox Sports Go application still signed in
AND all content items will be available 
AND the locked "Key" icon will NOT appear within their tile graphic

title: Verify FAQ is visible and accessible in the Settings > About section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AndroidTV device
AND has accessed the "Fox Sports Go" application
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Settings menu
THEN the 'About' menu
custom_expected:
FAQ section is present and accessible
(NOTE: Any content links within the section is NOT accessible.  This is known/expected behavior)
